fact_check_explanation_title: PTFE in masks does not pose a health risk, unless you get it very hot
fact_check_explanation_summary: PTFE heated to high temperatures can cause sickness, but this is rare, and unlikely to be caused by normal mask-wearing.

fact_check_explanation_title: The inventor of PCR never said it wasn’t designed to detect infectious diseases
fact_check_explanation_summary: Rumours about the inventor of the process of PCR, which is used to test whether someone currently has Covid-19, have been spreading on social media.

fact_check_explanation_title: Dominic Raab did not say Covid-19 tests have a 93% false positive rate
fact_check_explanation_summary: Mr Raab was referring to a PHE report on testing at airports and seems to have misspoken when he mentioned false positives.

fact_check_explanation_title: This post telling healthy people to stop getting tested is full of inaccuracies
fact_check_explanation_summary: The post cites inaccurate claims about how testing and virus levels are measured.

fact_check_explanation_title: This video makes a number of inaccurate claims about the Covid-19 pandemic
fact_check_explanation_summary: We have seen similar claims before about Pirbright, Serco, and the Test and Trace system.

fact_check_explanation_title: Labour’s tweet about Serco is missing some important context
fact_check_explanation_summary: Public and private contact tracers do different kinds of work, so it is difficult to compare their performance.

fact_check_explanation_title: Non-Covid deaths in private homes are up, but have decreased elsewhere
fact_check_explanation_summary: Metro claimed the non-Covid death toll is soaring. This refers just to deaths in private homes, not all deaths.

fact_check_explanation_title: Some Covid-positive students are being recorded at their home addresses
fact_check_explanation_summary: The government confirms students who do not register with a new GP at university are recorded as testing positive at their home address.

fact_check_explanation_title: What does an "Australia style" Brexit deal really mean?
fact_check_explanation_summary: On Sunday, Andrew Marr suggested that an “Australian terms” deal with the EU could well be called “Afghan” terms. Afghanistan actually has more favourable trade terms with the EU than …

fact_check_explanation_title: London Mayor candidate wrong to claim Covid-19 pandemic is no worse than a flu season
fact_check_explanation_summary: The number of deaths from Covid-19 far exceeds the number of deaths from flu in a given season, despite the much stricter controls in place.

fact_check_explanation_title: WhatsApp messages about a video called “India is doing it” are a hoax
fact_check_explanation_summary: The video and the hack mentioned in the message are not real.

fact_check_explanation_title: Contact tracing has not stopped in schools
fact_check_explanation_summary: Single Covid-19 cases in educational settings are being traced centrally, instead of by local teams
